info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 8:05PM CDT until April 24 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield MO
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...
Roubidoux Creek Near Waynesville affecting Pulaski County.
Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County.
Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...
James River near Boaz affecting Stone and Christian Counties.
Current River near Powder Mill affecting Shannon County.
For the Roubidoux Creek...including Waynesville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Big Piney River...including Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate... Minor flooding is forecast. For the James River...including Galena, Boaz...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Gasconade River...including Jerome, Hazelgreen...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Current River near Powder Mill.
* WHEN...From late tonight to late Thursday morning.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 11.0 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued by Sunday evening at 815 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING
